snippet: The governor’s office has released “The State of New York,” a mini-newscast with peppy music and upbeat news reports that will be broadcast every Friday.
abstract: Office of New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo unveils min-newscast titled The State of New York; newscast, produced by governor's press office and digital team, strikes upbeat tone, and highlights some of Cuomo's newsworthy announcements.
lead_paragraph: The governor’s office has released “The State of New York,” a mini-newscast with peppy music and upbeat news reports that will be broadcast every Friday.

headline.main: A Newscast Unveiled by Cuomo, for Cuomo
headline.print_headline: A Newscast Unveiled by Cuomo, for Cuomo
